---
title: "The effects of message persistence and user anonymity on political participation on social media"

On this website, you can find the companion material for the paper _The effects of message persistence and user anonymity on political participation on social media_. 

You can currently find the following information here:

- [Power analyses](power_analysis.html)
- [Planned analyses](analysis_preregistered.html)

This website is produced directly from the project's [github repository](https://github.com/XMtRa/persistence_anonymity_anon). You can download the material and the data, file an issue, or submit a pull request.
